SELECT NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE,STATUS FROM (
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_BOARD SYS_C007258) */ ROWNUM RN,NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE,STATUS FROM TBL_PRODUCT
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND MANUFACTURER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND SUPPLIER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND CATEGORY = '생활'
AND CATEGORY = '주방'
AND CATEGORY = '욕실'
AND CATEGORY = '반려동물'
AND CATEGORY = '화장품'
AND CATEGORY = '식품'
AND CATEGORY = '문구'
AND CATEGORY = '원예'
AND (REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
)
WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
